name: Dark Side (2020)
description:
psychological thriller / horror game in first person, you wake up in a strange and unfamiliar place, apparently wearing special clothes, you need to find out where you are as soon as possible because your oxygen level is running low!

You wake up in an apparently unknown and dark place, you realize that you are wearing a suit and an oxygen mask to be able to breathe, and the oxygen levels are going down, you will need to explore that place and activate all the light points before the levels of oxygen come to an end!

Is there something in this place beyond darkness?

Whenever possible, avoid running, but if necessary, run for your life!
